## ✨ About Me

I'm Abdul Rahman, a passionate Full-Stack Web Developer from India. My main areas of interest are web and mobile development, with a keen eye for creating intuitive and performant applications. I thrive on learning new technologies and solving complex problems through code. In my spare time, I enjoy exploring new tech trends and contributing to open-source projects.

---

## 🚀 Projects

Here are some of my notable projects, showcasing my skills in building real-world applications:

-   📁 **[User Authentication System](https://github.com/yourusername/auth-system)**
    *   A secure and scalable user authentication system built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, featuring JWT-based authentication and password hashing.
-   📁 **[Blog Website with EJS](https://github.com/yourusername/blog-ejs)**
    *   A dynamic blog platform demonstrating server-side rendering using EJS templates, complete with CRUD operations for posts.
